game.name: Wrath and Retribution
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, HDR 사용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A space combat roguelike set across a shattered solar system. Master the Specter Drive’s explosive dash to crush enemy squadrons and hunt massive warships alongside Merlin, your tactical co-pilot. Upgrade your fighter and companion with powerful rewards to unleash total retribution!
